ModMetaData.name: Cannibal and Insect Meals
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Adds cannibal and insect versions of all base meals.
General � Add these recipes/meals: Pemmican, Kibble, Simple Meal, Fine Meal, Lavish Meal, Packaged Survival Meal � Has added texture on the original textures to indicate cannibal-version. � Stats and nutritions are the same as the original meals
Compatibilities � Compatible with existant saves and other mods.
Contributors � Cerrendel
